content: this is a summary of a legal case that took place on september 4th 2020 the case involves a spouse who is claiming compensation for joint property they need to prove that the funds from the joint property were used up and that there was confusion between the joint funds and community funds the courts decision is based on article 1434 of the civil code and a court cassation belgium detention the plaintiff is represented by a lawyer the case was brought to the court of cassation by two parties referred to as md and w and their respective attorneys the court heard an appeal against a judgment made by the antwerp court of appeal on september 24 2019 the court found that the plaintiff failed to provide sufficient evidence to support their claim and dismissed the appeal ordering the plaintiff to pay costs the judgment was delivered by the court of cassation in brussels on september 4 2020
